head.title: UPDATED APRIL 20: School Lunch sites during school closure

meta.content: UPDATED APRIL 20: School Lunch sites during school closure

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h1: UPDATED APRIL 20: School Lunch sites during school closure

span.div: Newark City Schools will be offering grab-and-go breakfast and lunch packs from more than 20 locations across Newark. The meals will be available from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. every weekday. Please click here for a list of locations, organized by school attendance area. Families can visit any spot that is most convenient. The sites were updated on April 20. We are no longer serving meals at the following locations: Liberty Middle School, the Maintenance and Transportation Warehouse, White Field, the Administration Service Center, the Skate Park or Don Edwards, due to low demand.
